title: Ushio to Tora: Comical Deformer Gekijou
synopsis: Ushio encounters a strange purple monster that seems to be helpful, Tora deals with a kitten, and finally there is a mass chase, reprising all of the monsters from the OVA series.
staff: [['Yuyama, Kunihiko', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard']], ['Touma, Yumi', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Fujita, Kazuhiro', ['Original Creator']], ['Abe, Masashi', ['Associate Casting Director']]]
